# COMMENCEMENT DATE
AGREEMENT

This Commencement Date Agreement, dated this 4th day of August, 1998 by and between Dublin Oaks Limited, an Ohio limited liability company, hereinafter called the "Landlord", whose address is 8 East Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio 43215, and Tim Donut U.S. Limited, Inc., a Florida corporation, hereinafter "Tenant", whose address is P.O. Box 256, 4288 West Dublin-Granville Rd., Dublin, Ohio 43017.

## WITNESSETH:

WHEREAS, Landlord and Tenant have entered into a certain Lease Agreement (the "Lease") dated October 20, 1997 for 6850 Perimeter Loop, Dublin, Ohio 43017 (the "Premises"), said Premises being located in the Landlord's property known as the Avery Square Shopping Center;

WHEREAS, Landlord and Tenant desire to memorialize in writing the date of commencement and the date of expiration of the term of said Lease;

NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the sum of One Dollar ($1.00) and other valuable consideration, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, it is mutually agreed as follows:

(1) Thedate on which the term of the aforesaid Lease commenced is June 23, 1998 (the "Commencement Date"), and the date of expiration of the same shall be December 31, 2013 (the "Expiration Date"). All contingency clauses or conditions as to the effectiveness of the Lease contained in Tenant's favor in the Lease are hereby deemed waived and/or satisfied (to the extent not previously waived or satisfied) as of said date of commencement.

(2) Except for the foregoing stipulations, this instrument in no way alters, changes, modifies or amends the aforesaid Lease.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Landlord and Tenant have caused this instrument to be executed
this 4th day of August, 1998.

Witnesses (Two Required):

signature: <signature>
printed name: Benna S. Waterfield
signature: <signature>
printed named: DOREEN A. TOMPKINS

LANDLORD: Dublin Oaks Limited, an Ohio limited liability company
By: Lucas Avery Limited, an Ohio limited liability company, Member
149 By: <signature>
Don M. Castro, III, Managing Member

## ACKNOWLEDGMENTS

STATE OF OHIO }
COUNTY OF FRANKLIN } SS:

Before me, a Notary Public in and for said county, personally appeared the above named Landlord, Dublin Oaks Limited, an Ohio limited liability company, by Lucas Avery Limited, an Ohio limited liability company, Member, by Don M. Casto, III, Managing Member, duly authorized by all the Members of said limited liability company, who acknowledged the execution of the foregoing instrument to be his free and voluntary act and deed and the free act and deed of said limited liability companies, for the uses and purposes therein mentioned.

JN TESTIMONY WHEREOF, I have hereunto set my hand and official seal at Columbus, Ohio
this 1st day of August , 1998.

<signature>
Notary Public
MARGARET A. LARCOMB
NOTARY PUBLIC, STATE OF OHIO
BENNA S. WATERFIELD , Page 2
Notary Public, State of Ohio
My Commission Expires 06-20-2001
